creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a woman stands in the snow, with her hands nestled inside her blue kimono sleeves, hidden from the elements, a scarf at her neck, and a black hood covering her head; she glances to her right and carries an umbrella on her left
markings: Red, circular seal below the signature; red circle and rectangle stamps in the LRC
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Japanese characters in black along the L edge about three-quarters of the way down the image
title: Kakemono-e of a beauty walking in the snow
